title: Celsius Creditors to Vote on Bankruptcy-Escape Plan After Judicial Approval
description: Creditors will have a month to mull the sale to Fahrenheit, which court filings say could see them recover 67%-85% of holdings.

title: Will leaked SEC pending approval for Ethereum futures ETFs be precursor to further pain?
description:

title: Bitcoin’s plunge to $26.1k triggers massive reset in crypto market dynamics
description:
Quick Take The recent plummet of Bitcoin to $26.1k was a massive liquidation event, underlined by significant changes in the cryptocurrency’s perpetual funding rate and open interest. The perpetual funding rate, a mechanism used by exchanges for perpetual futures contracts, which usually sees long positions periodically pay short positions when positive, has shifted into the […]
